    public class MessagingServiceClient
extends Object
    Provides access to the messaging service.

      • sendMessagesIndefinitely

        public void sendMessagesIndefinitely(Message initialMessage)
        Waits for a message on the queue and sends it back to the origin. The beforeSendingMessage(Message) method is called before sending to allow for modifying the message content.
        Parameters:
        initialMessage - If set, this message is sent before waiting for messages to start the ball rolling.

      • sendMessagesIndefinitelyWithoutReceiving

        public void sendMessagesIndefinitelyWithoutReceiving(Message initialMessage)

      • beforeSendingMessage

        protected void beforeSendingMessage(Message message)
        Called before a message is being sent. The default implementation is empty.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that is subject to being sent.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:

      • getPort

        public static MessagingService getPort()
        Returns a proxy the messaging service, located at the configured address.
